segments.text: I have an appointment for half past one .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What can I help you with ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I have a problem with my class schedule .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It seems that I've been given two classes scheduled at the same time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can understand the problem with that .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is there any way that you can fix my schedule ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No problem , do you want those classes still ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me see if I can find one of these classes on another day .
segments.speaker: S2
